layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x104
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x104
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x80
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 115x18
          text run at (0,0) width 115: "COL WIDTH=px"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,34) size 608x46 [border: (1px outset #808080)]

          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0

          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 606x40

                text run at (2,20) width 124: "width of 200 pixels"
